title: Microsoft dinosaurs (MAC)
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Interactive media
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Multimedia systems
description: Grab your jungle gear, put on your pith helmet, and brace yourself - you're going on the journey of a lifetime. Trek deep into the forest and come face to face with those incredible animals that roamed and ruled the Earth millions of years ago. Hear them growl, explore their habitats and see who they meet in mortal combat. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: Any Macintosh computer with a Macintosh-compatible colour monitor; system 6.0.7 or later; 4 Mb of RAM; at least 2.5 Mb of available hard disk space; CD-ROM drive.
